address: Xã An Vũ, Huyện Quỳnh Phụ, Tỉnh Thái Bình
thought:
**Determining the New Administrative Unit for Xã An Vũ**

Okay, so the user wants to know the new administrative location for "Xã An Vũ, Huyện Quỳnh Phụ, Tỉnh Thái Bình." My process here is fairly straightforward, but it requires a methodical approach. First, I need to understand the historical changes.  "Tỉnh Thái Bình" needs to be addressed.  I know about the province merger that occurred - specifically, resolution 60-NQ/TW states the merger of "Tỉnh Thái Bình" and "Tỉnh Hưng Yên" into the new "Tỉnh Hưng Yên." This changes the provincial context.

With the new province established, my focus shifts to the ward itself: "Xã An Vũ." I'll need to dig into relevant resolutions to see if "Xã An Vũ" is explicitly mentioned in any restructuring plans for "Tỉnh Hưng Yên."

Scanning through other relevant resolutions, resolution 1666/NQ-UBTVQH15, caught my attention. It details the administrative restructuring of communes in "Tỉnh Hưng Yên," which is now the relevant province. Line 69 of this resolution provides the crucial link. It specifies a merger of several communes, including "An Vũ," into a new commune called "Xã Phụ Dực."  This is a direct hit!

To confirm, I'll cross-reference this information with a list of "New wards."  I have a record entry with the ward name "Xã Phụ Dực" and a ward code ("12523") within the "Tỉnh Hưng Yên" context. This confirms the accuracy of the resolution.

Therefore, the final output needs to capture all of this: the new province, the new ward, the source of the information (the resolution), the specific citation from that resolution, and a confidence level (which is "high" due to the direct matching and clear resolution).  The user will see that "Xã An Vũ" is now part of "Xã Phụ Dực" in "Tỉnh Hưng Yên."

citation.header: 1666/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Hưng Yên
citation.line: 69. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của thị trấn An Bài và các xã An Ninh (huyện Quỳnh Phụ), An Vũ, An Mỹ, An Thanh thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Phụ Dực.
